I'm looking for Need For Speed Hot Pursuit in English, every time I downloaded it is in Spanish, anyone know where I can download it  in the English version

to transale the non english "multi" versions go to the registry search the games reg map and the change RUS/FRE/.... to EN_US and to english in the version folder (1. Locale > EN_US, 2. LanguageName > english)
can be found here:
HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Electronic Arts\Need for Speed(TM) Hot Pursuit
